name: nativescript-feedback
description: Non-blocking textual feedback for your NativeScript app. AKA superfancy Toasts!

scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo.ios.device: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run android --emulator
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-feedback && tns plugin add .. && tns install
scripts.setup: npm i && cd demo && npm i && cd .. && npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin add .. && cd ..
